'''From Ashes Reborn''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Eons Adrift" [[Wanderer]] ({{Anemo}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table|From Ashes Reborn}}

==Trivia==
* All occurrences of this Wish Series have run alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Tulaytullah's Remembrance]], a weapon tailored to the Wanderer's gameplay mechanics.
